constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 212 (Wednesday, December 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SHERRILL:
H.R. 6172.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, clause 16 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H7556]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Kinnelon, New Jersey.
